articles.title: EPFO cuts interest rate to 8.1% for 2021-22, lowest in 43 years - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Last fiscal, this interest rate was 8.5%. The last time EPFO paid lower than Fy22 rate was in 1977-78 when the interest rate was 8%. This year's lowering of the rate is likely to disappoint millions of its salaried-class subscribers.

The Employees Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) on Saturday decided to pay 8.1 percent rate of interest on provident fund deposits for the current financial year, down from 8.5 percent in Fy21.
